EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-02-20 Container Adoption.Sorry we missed you
EmailTemplate.subject: [WEBINAR RECORDING] {{my.Webinar Title:default=the webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sorry we missed you for {{my.Webinar Title:default=The Webinar}}.
You can watch the webinar on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-container-adoption-wbn/]]>. We hope to see you for our next webinar on March 6th at 11 am ET, "AWS vs Azure". Register now to save your seat. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>
Enjoy the recording!
We hope you enjoy the recording!
-Team Turbonomic
